title: T206 Carolina Brights Hannifan For Sale
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: T206 Carolina Brights Hannifan For Sale
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am selling a T206 Carolina Brights Hannifan for a friend of mine who doesn't do technology too well. It is a raw card that I would grade a solid VG. The price of the card is $525, which includes insured delivery. There are only three graded Carolina Brights Hannifan cards in the PSA registry. None grade higher than PSA 3 (VG). There are two PSA 3 cards and one PSA 2 card.

You can pay with PayPal or US Postal money order.

You can contact me through the board or directly at [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/prewar/picsb/06-197b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/prewar/picsb/06-197rb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
